name: GPS Wireless Dog Fence System, Electric Dog Fence Using GPS Electric Satellite Technology, IPX7 Waterproof Rechargeable Design, GPS Dog Collar has 2 Modes Circular and Free-Form Fence
short_description: 【GPS Wireless Dog Fence System】Electric Electric Dog Fence using GPS electric satellite technology, Experience greater accuracy and precision with our newest GPS Fence, which makes you more flexible when setting boundaries,the collar receives signals from GPS satellites, and if the dog approaches the set boundary, it triggers corrective actions，making it the ideal choice for reliable boundary containment.

【2 Modes of Electric Dog Fence】Our wireless dog fence offers two modes: "circular fence" and "free-form fence". ① Circular fence: To quickly set a daily activity range for pets, select a center point and radius distance between 49ft and 6561ft to generate a standard circular invisible fence within 3 seconds. ② Custom polygonal fence: Set multiple vertices to freely outline the shape of the fence, achieving precise protection without dead corners and fitting the real terrain, providing comprehensive protection for every complex home environment

【No Burial Wire Needed】 Our advanced GPS collar creates a completely customizable, invisible barrier for your yard, park, or farm，GPS Wireless Dog Fences do not require any physical installation. This means you can quickly set up and modify the boundaries without worrying about digging trenches or installing posts.

【Rechargeable Waterproof Sealing System】The GPS dog fence can be fully charged within 3 hours, can work for a long time -24 hours when fully charged, making it easy to charge the GPS collar no matter where it is. The dog fence system is IPX7 waterproof, and the collar is adjustable, making it suitable for use by large, medium, and large dogs to meet their daily needs.

【Outdoor Use Only】dog fence collar receives signals from GPS satellites,It can only be used outdoors, Most effective outdoors, such as courtyards/parks, beaches, farms, or camping,and if the dog approaches the set boundary, it triggers corrective actions,The rechargeable battery provides extended use,Suitable for various weather conditions and terrains, it is perfect for all day outdoor exploration, allowing you to feel at ease.

ADJUSTABLE, CUSTOM FIT: The GPS dog collar allows for a custom fit to large, medium, & small dogs with necks 8" to 30." Dogs must be 10 lbs & up, 5 months & older
UP TO 48 HOUR BATTERY LIFE: Extended battery life with a faster charging time of 1 hour for continuous real-time location tracking

CUSTOMER SERVICE: Download the Halo app to create & store GPS fences. For technical help on the collar (sizing & battery life), app, or dog training, contact the Halo Dog Park, our customer service team, for 1:1 live support

name: PetSafe Stay & Play 2-Dog Wireless Fence for Stubborn Dogs - America's Safest Wireless Pet Containment System - No Dig Electric Fence - Circular Boundary - Secure 3/4-Acre Yard - for Dogs 5lb+
short_description: Wireless Freedom: The PetSafe Stay & Play Wireless Fence is a lightweight, travel-friendly system that sets up in 1-2 hours with a circular boundary covering up to 3/4 acre; no digging required
Safe Wireless Fence: With 5 adjustable correction levels, a tone-only training mode, and static-free reentry, this static collar tailors to your dog's temperament and reinforces positive behavior
Adjustable Neck Collar: The waterproof, rechargeable receiver collar fits dogs more than 6 months old weighing at least 5 lb and offers adjustable neck sizes from 6-28 in
Global Mission, Local Care: With U.S. roots and worldwide reach, PetSafe delivers vet- and trainer-recommended solutions and exceptional customer support to create fields of joy for pets
25 Years of Trust: Since 1998, PetSafe has created safe, innovative, and trusted products that bring joy, enhance pet lives, and support the lifelong bond between pets and their families
product_description: The PetSafe Stay & Play Wireless Fence for Stubborn Dogs is a powerful, portable pet containment system designed specifically for high-energy, hard-to-train dogs. Using advanced wireless fence technology, this system creates a secure, invisible boundary perimeter with no digging or buried wires required. The circular boundary can be adjusted to cover up to 3/4 of an acre, offering a flexible and accurate wireless fence solution that sets up in just 1–2 hours. Simply plug in the training transmitter, place the included boundary flags, and customize the range to suit your yard or travel destination. The included waterproof, rechargeable receiver collar features a tone-only mode and five adjustable static correction levels, making it easy to tailor the training to your dog’s temperament. Static-free reentry further reinforces positive behavior. The collar also includes a battery status indicator and fits neck sizes from 6-28 inches, ensuring a secure and comfortable fit for dogs 5 pounds and up. This multi-pet training system supports additional collars, allowing all your pets to enjoy the yard safely. With over 25,000 five-star reviews and recognition as the best wireless fence for persistent dogs by Forbes, the PetSafe Stay & Play Wireless Fence delivers a reliable, expert-recommended way to keep your pets safe, happy, and free to play. Since 1988, PetSafe has been driven by a simple belief: safe, healthy pets lead to happier lives for pets and their families. For over 25 years, we've been dedicated to enhancing the lives of pets and the people who love them, treating every pet as a cherished family member and delivering life-changing innovations designed to enrich every moment. With U.S. roots and a global reach, our vet- and trainer-recommended products are built for every pet and backed by exceptional customer support. From backyards to dog parks, we're on a mission to create fields of joy for happy, healthy, and safe pets.

name: Homrich 2 in1 GPS Wireless Dog Fence, Electric Dog Fence, IPX7 Waterproof Pet Containment System with 3 Training Modes Invisible Fence with 2 Replacement Collars for Dogs Over 8 Lbs Outdoor Use
short_description: 2-in-1 GPS Dog Fence & Remote Training: Train your dog and set invisible boundaries with one device! The gps dog collar fence system combines a GPS fence (30-990 yards radius) and a remote trainer (330 yards range) to keep your dog safe while correcting unwanted behaviors. It is perfect for backyard freedom or outdoor adventures.

Triple Satellite Support GPS & Smart Safety Alerts: Uses GPS satellites for precise location tracking. Set precise boundaries via GPS with real-time distance monitoring. Automatically triggers warnings (beep, vibration, or static stimulation) if your dog crosses the boundary. Note: Triggers 6-level warning cycle when pet exits safe radius, runs with 2 warning cycles to prevent overstimulation. Continuous alerts (protection mode ("P" icon)) activate until the battery dies or the pet returns.

Humane Training with 3 Modes & 16 Levels: Start with gentle beeps (Level 1-8), escalate to vibrations (Level 1-8), or use safe static stimulation (Level 0-16). Find your dog’s “recognition level” for stress-free training. No harmful punishment — designed to guide, not scare!

Long-Lasting Battery & Fast Type-C Charging: The rechargeable gps dog collar lasts 7 days (1500mAh), and the remote works 15 days (400mAh). Fully recharge in 1.5h (collar) or 0.4h (remote) via the original Type-C USB. Low-power mode saves energy when inactive. (The charging voltage is 5V/1A, Avoid using USB PD power adapter)

Durable & Adjustable for All Sizes: IPX7 waterproof dog collar fits necks 7-25 inches (8-120 lbs). Includes 2 reflective dog collar straps, silicone caps for comfort, and a static test lamp. Warning: Not for small dogs or aggressive breeds (e.g., Pit Bulls). Puppies (<6 months) or dogs without basic obedience training (e.g., "sit," "stay") should not use this product.

Auto-Save Settings & Easy Setup: Automatically saves the last center point and radius. Set boundaries via remote (330 Yards range) or collar. An ideal solution for yards, parks, and hiking trails, this wireless electric dog fence ensures safe containment for your pet in diverse outdoor settings. Please reset the center point if location changes (recommended every 5 days).

Usage Environment: Use outdoors in open areas (avoid trees, roofs) with GPS signal strength ≥2 bars. Limit daily collar wear to ≤12 hours; adjust tightness every 1-2 hours (one finger should fit between collar and neck). Turn off the collar when not in use to prevent battery drain from constant GPS signal searching.

Packing List: GPS dog collar x 1 (80g); Remote control x 1; Replacement reflective collar straps x 2 (black / orange); Wristband x 1; USB-C charging cable x 1; Static stimulus test lamp x 1; Conductive silicone caps x 4;User manual x 1

name: MIMOFPET Wireless Dog Fence for 2 Dogs - Covers up to 856-Acre Electric Fence,6000FT Waterproof Collar with Remote,Rechargeable Pet Containment System with 3 Training Modes for Large Medium Dogs
short_description: 【NEW 2 in1 Wireless Fence System】The improved wireless dog collar fence system features a simple operation, allowing you to set it up quickly and easily.MIMOFPET Wireless dog fence with training remote is a combination system that includes both the wireless fence for dogs and the dog training collar train and control your dog's behavior.The electric fence for dogs utilizes dual-directional signal transmission technology, ensuring a stable signal that can be used both indoors and outdoors.

【Portable Dog Fence Wireless】The compact design of this wireless pet fence makes it easy to carry and set up wherever you go, giving you the flexibility to create the boundary for your pet at any location. The wireless dog fence system has 14 levels of range adjustable distance from 25 feet to 3500 feet. When the dog crosses the set boundary line, the receiver collar automatically emit warning beep and vibration, alerting the dog to back away.

【Humane Dog Training Collar】The shock collars for dogs with 3 modes: Beep, Vibrate(1-9 levels) and SAFE Static(1-30 levels).Three different training modes with multiple levels for you to choose from. We recommend starting at a lower level to test the appropriate setting for your dog.Dog shock collar with remote up to 5900ft range allows you to train your dogs easily indoors/outdoors.

【Incredible Battery Life&IPX7 Waterproof 】The rechargeable electric dog fence wireless has long battery life, standby time up to 185 days(If the electronic fence function is turned on, it can be used for about 85 hours.) Tips:Exit wireless dog fence mode when not in use to save power.The training collar for dogs is IPX7 waterproof, ideal for training in any weather and place.

【Security Keypad Lock&LED Light】The keypad lock is specially designed for the safety of dogs, which can effectively prevent accidental misoperation and give wrong instructions to dogs.The dog training remote is also equipped with two flashlight lighting modes so that you can quickly find your far-away dog in the dark.

name: 4-in-1 Wireless Dog Fence System, Electric Fences for Medium Large Dogs, 4 Modes Training Collar with Remote, IPX7 Waterproof, Portable Indoor & Outdoor Safe Pet Containment, Real-Time Display
short_description: 【4-in-1 Wireless Dog Fence System with Camping Essentials】Experience the ultimate convenience with our wireless dog fence and static training collar. Featuring a built-in flashlight, compass, and carabiner clip, it's portable for dogs camping outdoor. Set up your electric fence in minutes with no digging required. Perfect for RV dog fence setups, camping trips, hiking, or backyard use. Keep your pet safe wherever adventure takes you

【Advanced Remote Training Collar with 3300FT Range】Train your dog effectively with Beep, Vibration, and Static Stimulation modes (1-16 levels). The remote training collar with static level offers a 3300 ft training range, ideal for open fields, parks, or large yards. The premium TPU strap adjusts 15-130 lbs, fitting medium-to-large breeds comfortably. Correct unwanted behaviors like barking, digging, or running off—safe, humane, and reliable

【Wireless Fence with Customizable Boundary】Create a secure play area with our wireless dog fence system. Choose from 8 distance levels to set an invisible boundary of 33-656 ft radius. When your dog approaches the edge, the collar emits beep and vibration warnings; Select corrective pulse or harmless pulse mode to match your training style. The electric fence keeps your pet within safe zones without physical barriers

【Remote with Color TFT Screen】The e collar is controlled via a high-resolution color TFT remote that shows your dog's current status—Stay, Walk, Jump, or Running—along with mode, battery life, and stimulation level at a glance. Intuitive buttons and a bright readout let you switch between training and fence modes in seconds, even under bright outdoor light

【IPX7 Waterproof & Long Battery Life】Built for outdoor adventures, the IPX7 waterproof collar handles rain, splashes, and brief submersion without missing a beat. Enjoy 36-48 hours of runtime in fence mode or up to 7 days in training-only mode on a single 2-hour USB recharge. Reliable performance that keeps pace with every hike, camp, or garden play session

name: 4-in-1 Wireless Dog Fence System Electric Dog Fence with Training Collar & Anti-Bark Collar, Real-Time Pet Status Display, Portable Waterproof Outdoor Pet Containment System
short_description: 4-in-1 Complete Pet Management: Elevate your pet's safety and behavior with our innovative system. It seamlessly integrates a Wireless Dog Fence, a versatile Dog Training Collar, an intelligent Anti-Bark Mode, and a real-time Pet Status Display – your all-in-one solution for simplified pet care and enhanced outdoor freedom.

Flexible Wireless Containment: Set up an invisible boundary anywhere with our Wireless Dog Fence, offering an adjustable radius from 33 to 1000 feet. This flexible, remote-centered fence ensures your dog stays safe within designated areas, perfect for yards, parks, or any open outdoor space. You'll find it's a superior alternative to traditional electric fence for dogs systems, offering unparalleled portability.

Multi-Mode Professional Training: Achieve effective behavior correction with our Dog Training Collar, boasting a 3300-foot training range. Choose from Vibration, Sound, or Static Correction modes, each with 8 adjustable intensity levels (1-8), allowing for humane and personalized training tailored to your dog's needs.

Enhanced Visibility & Safety: Designed for convenience, the receiver features a unique breathing light, making it effortless to spot your dog in low-light conditions or at night. This added visibility ensures their safety during evening walks or playtime in the backyard.

IPX7 Waterproof & Extended Battery Life: Our IPX7 waterproof receiver withstands splashes, rain, and even brief submersion, ensuring durability for all adventures. Enjoy prolonged use with 36-48 hours of battery life in fence mode, or up to 7 days when solely using the training function.

name: PetSafe Basic In-Ground Pet Fence Underground Dog Fence, Pet Electric Containment, Waterproof Collar for Dogs, Adjustable Collar Fits Neck Sizes 6-26 in, Wired Dog Containment System (Multi-Color)
short_description: CUSTOMIZABLE FENCE: The PetSafe Basic In-Ground Pet Fence allows you to create an inground dog fence that fits your yard's shape and size. This underground dog fence offers flexibility and customization, ensuring the fence perfectly fits your yard, regardless of its size or shape. Create a safe 1/3-acre play area for your best friend with the included 500 ft of wire; purchase additional wire to fence in up to 5 acres

PET SAFETY: Experience the convenience of an in ground dog fence with the PetSafe Basic In-Ground Pet Fence, a crucial tool for pet owners. This in ground fence for dogs ensures the safety of your pet while allowing them the freedom to roam and play within a designated area.

ADJUSTABLE CORRECTION: With the PetSafe Basic In-Ground Pet Fence, an invisible dog fence, you can adjust the level of correction to your pet's response during training. With four levels of static correction and one tone-only option, you are sure to find the perfect level for your pet! This dog fence outdoor for yard is key in ensuring your pet stays within the designated play area, providing a tailored approach to pet training.

COMFORTABLE COLLAR: The Deluxe UltraLight In-Ground Fence Receiver Collar is a dog fence collar that is comfortable and safe for your pet to wear, regardless of their size or breed. This in ground dog fence collar is waterproof and comfortably fits dogs weighing 8 lbs and up, adjusting to fit neck sizes between 6-26 inches.

MULTI-PET COMPATIBILITY: The PetSafe Basic In-Ground Pet Fence's compatibility with all PetSafe In-Ground Fence receiver collars, except for YardMax and Classic, allows you to customize the system to suit the needs of each individual pet. This compatibility feature makes the PetSafe Basic In-Ground Pet Fence a versatile and adaptable solution for households with multiple pets.
U.S.-BASED CUSTOMER CARE: Our pet product experts are here to help you and your pet and are available by phone, email or chat if you have any questions
Battery-operated collar: The collar has a low battery indicator and uses replaceable PetSafe RFA-67 battery; Battery is included
Contain all your pets: With the purchase of additional collars, this in-ground fence system allows you to safely contain an unlimited number of pets
Compatibility: Works with all PetSafe in-ground fence receiver collars except YardMax receiver collars
product_description: Experience tranquility with our in-ground dog fence, knowing your beloved pet is securely confined within your property, courtesy of the PetSafe Basic In-Ground Pet Fence. This in-ground fence for dogs enables you to establish a safe 1/3-acre play area with the provided 500 ft of wire, ensuring your pet has plenty of room to explore while remaining within safe limits. Larger yard? No problem! This in ground fence system can cover up 5 acres, with the purchase of additional wire. More than just a containment tool, this invisible dog fence also serves as a correction and training device. The dog fence outdoor for yard boasts a tone-only mode and 4 levels of adjustable static correction, enabling you to tailor the system to your pet's requirements. Setting up the inground dog fence, the PetSafe Basic In-Ground Pet Fence, is a do-it-yourself weekend task, allowing you to construct a fence that suits your yards shape and size. Once installed, with a little training and the dog fence collar, your dog will learn his new play area in just 2 weeks! For households with multiple pets, there's no cause for concern with our underground dog fence. With the purchase of additional in-ground dog fence collars, this system enables you to safely contain an unlimited number of pets. Powered by batteries, the dog fence collar features a low battery indicator and uses a replaceable PetSafe RFA-67 battery, which is included. You can expect 1-3 months of battery life, depending on use! With U.S.-based customer care, our pet product experts are here to help you and your pet with any questions about the invisible dog fence.
